name: Tappy Chicken Bird Brave & Flappy
description:
so brave, so flappy
a little chicken bird that can barely fly
and the cacti are so high
but you can use a tap
and help brave little Tappy flap
between as many cacti
as he can get by
But don't get too flappy
or bye bye Tappy

free.
simple.
addictive.
fun.

enjoy.

#tappychicken

Tappy Chicken Bird Brave & Flappy
